text: Adam Craig Gilchrist (born 14 November 1971 in Bellingen, New South Wales) is a former Australian cricketer. He was a wicket keeper and a left handed batsman. In his test career, Gilchrist hit 100 sixes, something nobody else in history has done. He holds the record of the second fastest century maker in history. Category:Australian cricketers Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales
title: Adam Gilchrist
